parallel.distributed

Class PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrvAwaitWrksRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.RRObject
      • parallel.distributed.TaskObjectsAsynchExecutionRequest
        • parallel.distributed.PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrvAwaitWrksRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    class PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorSrvAwaitWrksRequest
extends TaskObjectsAsynchExecutionRequest
    auxiliary class wrapping a request so that PDAsynchBatchTaskExecutorClt client objects may await server's workers. Not part of the public API.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2016

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
